titleStmt.title: A memorial delivered to His Majesty by the Honourable Edward Howard and Bernard Howard of Norfolk, the 16th day of November, 1676, of what they demand from their brother the Right Honourable Henry, Earl Marsha11 of England wiih [sic] the grounds and reasons of and for their said demands.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Edward.

titleStmt.title: A memorial delivered to His Majesty by the Honourable Edward Howard and Bernard Howard of Norfolk, the 16th day of November, 1676, of what they demand from their brother the Right Honourable Henry, Earl Marsha11 of England wiih [sic] the grounds and reasons of and for their said demands.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Edward.
Howard, Bernard.
Norfolk, Henry Howard, Duke of, 1628-1684.
MacDonnel, Alexander.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Includes memorial of Alexander MacDonnel on behalf of his wife, Elizabeth, and the response of Henry Duke of Norfolk to all three.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
